name: ManualValidation
description: Pause deployment and wait for manual validation
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: validators
inputs.label: Manual Validators
inputs.helpMarkDown: Only users added in validators list can act on a manual validation.

inputs.name: validationOrder
inputs.label: Require manual validation to occur in sequence
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, will cause manual validation to occur in sequence.

inputs.name: minRequiredValidators
inputs.label: Minimum number of validations required
inputs.helpMarkDown: Minimum number of validations required for the deployment to continue.

inputs.name: instructions
inputs.label: Instructions
inputs.helpMarkDown: These instructions will be shown to the user for resuming or rejecting the manual intervention. Based on these instructions the user will take an informed decision about this manual intervention.

inputs.name: rejectOnTimeout
inputs.label: Reject deployment on timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Reject or resume this manual intervention automatically after it is pending for the specified timeout or 60 days, whichever is earlier.
